Environment.CrewMemberTypes

Class CrewMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • Environment.CrewMemberTypes.CrewMember
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Captain, Communicator, Doctor, Engineer, Navigator, Scientist, Security

    public class CrewMember
extends java.lang.Object
    Super Class of crew members. Performs the general actions of the crew members like sleep eat etc.
    Author:
    Benjamin Thurber, Blake Kayser

    • Method Detail

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Crew member sleeps and decreases default amount of exhaustion

      • eat

        public void eat()
        Crew member eats and decreases default amount of hunger.

      • useMedicalItem

        public void useMedicalItem()
        Crew member uses medical item and regains some amount of health. If they have space plague then cures that.

      • receiveHealingFromDoctor

        public void receiveHealingFromDoctor()
        Called when a CrewMember is healed from a doctor and not by himself using a medical item

      • repairSheilds

        public void repairSheilds(Ship ship)
        Parameters:
        ship - the ship to repair the shields of

      • pilotShip

        public void pilotShip()
        Called when a crew member pilots the ship. Decrements an action

      • searchPlanet

        public void searchPlanet(Planet planet,
                         GameEnvironment environment,
                         int findShipPartSucsessRate,
                         java.lang.String foundPartMessage,
                         java.lang.String couldntFindPartMessage)
        Called when a CrewMember searches a planet
        Parameters:
        planet - the Planet object to be searched
        environment - the current GameEnvironment object
        findShipPartSucsessRate - integer 0 to 100 representing the percent chance of crew member finding a space ship part if its there
        foundPartMessage - String the message displayed when a CrewMember finds a part
        couldntFindPartMessage - String the message displayed when a CrewMember DOESEN'T finds a part

      • searchPlanet

        public void searchPlanet(Planet planet,
                         GameEnvironment environment)

        current health int

      • addHealth

        public void addHealth(int addedHealth)
        Adds/subtracts health. If dropped to 0 CrewMember dies.
        Parameters:
        addedHealth - int health increase (positive or negative)

      • getHunger

        public int getHunger()
        Returns:
        current hunger int

      • addHunger

        public void addHunger(int addedHunger)
        Adds/subtracts hunger. If raised to 100 CrewMember dies.
        Parameters:
        addedHunger - int hunger increase (positive or negative)

      • getAvatarImage

        public java.lang.String getAvatarImage()
        Returns:
        String of the path of CrewMembers's avatar image as given in each Subclass of CrewMember i.e. "/Images/Avatars/<specialization>.png"

      • getNumActions

      • setNumActionsReset

        public void setNumActionsReset()
        Resets number of actions to MAX_ACTIONS

      • decrementNumActions

        public boolean decrementNumActions()
        Remove one Action (min 0) Returns true if there was an action remaining when the method was called.
        Returns:
        boolean which is true if the crew member had any actions remaining when the method was called.
